name: Warp Pillar
description: A light beam that teleports the player from one map to another. The target map requires the 'WPPA' actor and 4 players to start at the given coordinates.

fields.name: Map X Coordinate
fields.description: The X-coordinate on the target map where the player will appear after teleportation.

fields.name: Map Y Coordinate
fields.description: The Y-coordinate on the target map where the player will appear after teleportation.
